item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, June 18, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. French businesses court Marine Le Pen after taking fright at left’s policies
2. John Lewis and Waitrose blame shoplifting surge on ‘greed not need’
3. Mark Rutte offers deal to Viktor Orbán as he seeks to clinch Nato top job
4. Apple scraps ‘buy now, pay later’ service in US just months after rollout
5. London drags down UK productivity
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, June 18, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
